summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 BUICK LUCERNE. AFTER REMOVING THE KEY FROM THE IGNITION SWITCH, THE VEHICLE FAILED TO TURN OFF. THE CONTACT STATED THAT EXCESSIVE FORCE WAS REQUIRED IN ORDER TO TURN AND REMOVE THE KEY. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 51,977.
